abstract: Pope Francis is met with excitement as he arrives in Nairobi--first stop of three-nation tour and his first trip to Africa as pope; arrives in small Honda to reinforce his stand against material excess; tells audience at Kenya's State House speech of Gospel's directive to work with integrity for common good.
lead_paragraph: The pontiff’s schedule for the five-day trip is packed with meetings, red-carpet receptions and a Mass on Thursday for as many as one million people.

headline.main: Pope Francis Arrives in a Kenya Fed Up With Graft
headline.print_headline: Pope Arrives in a Kenya Fed Up With Graft

snippet: The pontiff’s schedule for the five-day trip is packed with meetings, red-carpet receptions and a Mass on Thursday for as many as one million people.
